meanings.sent1: The forest became brushier as we ventured deeper into the woods.
meanings.sent2: Her hair looked brushier after she brushed it thoroughly.
meanings.sent3: The brushier bushes seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brushier strokes added depth to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The path through the brushier area was challenging but rewarding.

meanings.definition: Having more brush than something else
meanings.sent1: The brushier side of the hill was harder to climb.
meanings.sent2: The garden on the left looked brushier than the one on the right.
meanings.sent3: The brushier section of the park was a favorite hiding spot for squirrels.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a brushier bloom among the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The brushier coat of the dog made it stand out in the crowd.
